edu.ncsu.dre.impl.engine
Class LiveSearchProvider

java.lang.Object
  edu.ncsu.dre.impl.engine.LiveSearchProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServiceProvider, java.io.Serializable
public class LiveSearchProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceProvider

LiveSearchProvider is a data service provider add-in for the DRE framework, it collects information on the given subset of artifact using Microsoft LiveSearch SOAP service gathers information on each of the elements of the subset and returns the results as a map. The source artifact subset element acts as the key and the results obtained acts as the value of the (key, value) pair in the Map.

Author:
Santthosh Babu Selvadurai
See Also:
